name: storage-node
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.test: npm run build:ts && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && c8 node --test -r ts-node/register "test/**/*.ts"
scripts.start: npm run build:ts && cross-env LANG=ko_KR.UTF-8 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings" fastify start -l info dist/app.js | pino-pretty --colorize
scripts.dev:start: cross-env LANG=ko_KR.UTF-8 NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings" fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js | pino-pretty --colorize
scripts.dev:nodemon: nodemon --watch src --ext ts,js,json --exec "npm run build:ts && cross-env LANG=ko_KR.UTF-8 NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings' fastify start -l info dist/app.js | pino-pretty --colorize"
